Daniel McOrmond

Here’s a mental list I’ve been compiling based on feedback from the V1:

  • NYS Trooper: Ka and Laser
  • Monroe County Sheriff: Ka
  • East Rochester Police: K
  • Greece Police: K

Other than automatic door openers, I’ve never seen anyone using X band around here, so I disabled it.

Those programmable, transportable roadside construction signs use K band. I wonder if they are recording vehicle speed data as people drive by?
